subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to write the assertion?
msgSnippet: ... It is true that this has been common opinion in the software community, but that opinion is changing. I would say this: the programmers should not be the
messageBody:
hdpoliya wrote:

> But to my knowlege, your experience is against the theory of software
> engineering. We suggest that during developing, the testers of a
> program should not be the ones developed it.
> I am confused.

It is true that this has been common opinion in the software community,
but that opinion is changing.

I would say this: the programmers should not be the /only/ one who test
the code they write.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
